name: Inkedjoy POD Dropshipping
author: Inkedjoy/EPROLO

sections.description:
Free Forever Dropshipping APP

1.Ships from US and Aus to local customers, ships from China to Europe and North America with Express shipping, 5-10 days delivery.
2.More than 1000 products: t-shirts, hoodies, sweatshirts, mugs, bags, home decors, shoes, accessories, and more products you have never seen.
3.Inkedjoy POD provides more competitive price than others, you can earn more from every single order. Enjoy the higher profit margins.
sections.installation:
1. Install and activate “Inkedjoy POD” Plugin at wordpress.
    Before connect to Inkedjoy POD, the following conditions must be met:
    (1) WooCommerce plugin has been installed and activated;
    (2) Set permalinks to anything other than ��Plain�� in Settings > Permalinks;
    (3) Your website must be an SSL connection.
  2. Click “Connect to Inkedjoy POD” and authorize.
  3. Select WooCommerce Shipment Tracking Plugin for automating order fulfillment.

SUPPORT

for all support requests, please use the contact form of the website https://inkedjoy.com or send an email to support@inkedjoy.com

Further Reading

  • How to install Inkedjoy APP to your Woocommerce store?
  • How to Create a 3D printing Product?
  • How to Use Inkedjoy Print on Demand?
  • Customize Branding
